reviews.text: I always go there for their chocolate pastries..... best they have is choco fantasy.... enjoy it hot with scoop of vanilla ice-cream..... must try when you visit there.... other things are also good there.... like their sandwiches and coffes and other cold beverages........
I love this place... Visiting this since 2012... Yes.. best things do happen over a cup of coffee...  Lots of memories for lifetime...
A nice place if you want to spend time leisurely. ( without spending too much) Ps: We ordered only a tea and coffee so no comments about the food. Service was fine.

Awesome beverage as well as food of CCD. 
Well coordinated staff ...................
Nice place to enjoy coffee. Good Environment

Out of the three good vegetarian restaurants at kadavanthra junction, this one is the most affordable. Service is usually quick and the place is almost never completely empty but they have enough seating capacity to handle the rush. The rates of food are average and what you can expect from a normal veg only place. They serve food from early morning onwards. The food is okay but nothing to write home about. Their tea and coffee is, however, excellent and sometimes I even find myself ordering a second coffee after dinner...

Very nice and tasty vegetarian foods. They keep the standard of taste the same every time you go there. Hand wash area is too cramped and no tissues kept around. Bit meatless there. Parking is a concern as it is very near to Kadavantra junction.
Good food .But little expensive.Very close to Thampanoor Bus stand and Railway station .Good ambience and good service  Masala dosa is very good
Veg restaurant which serves at a reasonable rate. Peaceful ambience and good food. Breakfast and lunch s re great here.
Best vegetarian restaurant in the area with food at cheap price and great variety.

Food:
Food quality is good and taste is also okay (definitely not the best!).
Nevertheless, prices are bit higher comparing to other local restaurants.

Environment:
One of the nicest eatery of Chittagong city in terms of interior decoration. They have sufficient space and setting is quite good.
You won't be bothered with loud noises.
Again, stuffs are well behaved.

Location:
Situation at city's commercial hub, Agrabad. Therefore easily accessible.
Lovely place. It has a very beautiful environment. The staff's behaviour is very polite. Food quality is great.

Very good quality foods...great restaurant to held some party....like wedding.birthday.seminar.etc.
Waiters have very good behavior...
I have ordered Chinese food.chinese food was so good
There service is very good...
There food quality is great
It is nice restaurant. Buffett available here . Anybody choose it for his personal or family program. It's service quick and all the buddies are cordial.
Nice place to have good & testy food. Quality of food & service is very good. We have a conference in their. It was a good experience about the restaurant.
